entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 6:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 2 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle or showers in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight then becoming north 20 gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
